Instructions for use :
Disable SmartScreen
Disable Windows defender and anti- virus program
Add to the list of exceptions Windows defender and Anti- Virus program folder or copy the code
code:
% ProgramFiles% KMSpico *. Exe

Start the installation KMSpico administrator ! and follow the instructions
If you see a small window with the program KMSpico, press the big red button
After installation is complete, turn on Windows defender and Anti -Virus ( No need to include SmartScreen. It locks automatically by the program KMSpico)
Run the program as administrator KMSpico
Click on the blue button and check the correctness of activation
Bon appetit! :)
